Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 24.0.9-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 24.0.9-3. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 24.0.9-3, affected by CVE-2023-45288
